title: How to create a freelance writer website - Quora

response.answer_text: You can build your freelance writer website using WordPress. First, you need to register a domain name. This is your own URL such as awesomewriter.com. Then you’re going to need web hosting for your domain. You can get this from a web hosting company like Bluehost, Siteground, or Hostgator. Then you need to install WordPress so you can publish blog posts and add content to your website. After setting up WordPress, you need to install a theme that suits the way you want your website to look. I have written a step-by-step guide here. Cheers!
